This place is well staffed , there are usually 2 or 3 receptionsts at the front desk , always willing to go out of their way for you. Especially Thuy and Ms. Kim - they are fantastic and will help make your stay very enjoyable. there is a large breakfast buffet available every day from 7 to 10AM. My family and I stayed here for one night and had a wonderful stay. The staff went above and beyond , even meeting us at the train station at 4:30am to take us to the hotel. Being so early in the morning , our rooms were not ready for check - in , but the staff offered us the entire spa as a place to rest/shower/relax , which was a nice touch.
